description: Quickly translate text using Bing Translator with keyboard shortcut or status bar button
command.translate.title: Translate Text
command.translateSelection.title: Translate Selection
config.title: Bing Translator
config.sourceLanguage.description: Source language code (e.g., 'en' for English, 'auto-detect' for auto-detection)
config.targetLanguage.description: Target language code (e.g., 'zh-Hans' for Chinese Simplified)
config.useWebviewUI.description: Use unified Webview UI for translation (if disabled, will use multi-step quick pick interface)
